conbody.p: The workflow for developing a GUI template for customized PDFs is as follows:

li.xref: Create a new DITA template (MFD) in the com.miramo.mmpdf/mmtemplates folder
Publish DITA content using the new MFD file with PDF tooltips enabled

ol.li: Review the PDF tooltips and decide which format definitions you would like to change

li.xref: Use MiramoDesigner to modify the format definitions in the MFD template

ol.li: Repeat steps 2 to 5 until you're happy with the output
Publish to production PDF with tooltips disabled [showProperties=N]

conbody.p: Once you are happy with your initial MFD template design it is strongly recommended that you create a custom plugin and move the MFD to the custom plugin. This is good practice as it allows the plugin to be shared easily, and for new versions of the and the to be installed without changes to the custom plugin, for ease of ongoing maintenance.
